phrases: No... my school is nearby, so...
There is some left over again.
He does not seem to have much of an appetite lately.
You should come here once you are done with nursing school.
It would be a huge help, having someone as reliable as you here.
South 412 Yamaguchi Youhei Kihara Isamu Tanaka Masaru Kitagawa Kyosuke
Once you are out of the hospital, you can eat whatever you want as much as you like.
All right, I am going to wipe you down.
We all have to be together.
Apparently a professor from Tsumugu's lab.
If he is from the city, he probably will not like country cooking.
Go buy some alcohol and meat with that.
I will give you a lift.
I was thinking about stopping by Saya Mart on my way home.
Apparently the girl's dad is the president of some company,
so he is going to quit school and work at her dad's company.
That is this year's biggest surprise.
He said he would be back for the coming-of-age ceremony,
so we are all going to tease him.
and it is only been five years.
I think you have changed the most.
There is a rumor going around like you are some lonely housewife.
You were probably out playing pachinko again.
Just went out for a refresher.
The boss was waiting quite a while...
He only listens to Miuna so I do not know what to do with him.
It is all thanks to Miuna.
The people of the sea can hibernate, right?
Then Hikari-kun and the others are probably asleep, too.
I am sure they are okay.
There is no way I can have the baby right now...
We have been blessed with a baby...
Do not say something so sad...
It will be a little brother.
I am happy that I will have a younger brother.
He is so obsessed with that lately...
Did you get one of your special kancho attacks in?
You look a lot like your uncle.
Hikari used to sleep a lot, too.
Now, today's the day of the exciting Tomoebi.
Before, you could not see it unless you were at the bottom of the sea.
And, now it is the moon rather than the sun.
Because the sea is frozen, the ice acts like a prism,
and gathers the light from the saltflake snow.
That creates an image in the atmosphere,
Only visible from inside the sea
When the moon is low in the sky, let us see...
I would say 8 of the clock is probably the best viewing time.
After this, it is time to get ready for the rice feeding.
Having a rice feeding by the sea with everyone...
It is sort of nostalgic, is not it?
The main event is the Tomoebi.
Having class at night is exciting.
Minegishi's planning to ask you out.
Sayu, you used to hate studying.
I have decided that I am going to be a girl living on her own.
It is not like I am going to find work in Oshiooshi...
So I am going to go out into the city and become an independent woman.
You have thought out your future that far?
But I do not plan on leaving.
Do not you guys have to be in school?
At that moment, I decided I would not cry.
Because I knew that Hikari and the others were in the sea.
I believed that they were safe.
Hikari and the others are still somewhere I cannot go, smiling.
I went to look at the sea again for a little bit.
But something is in the way so it is no use.
The sea temperature's gone down, too...
We would always gotten pregnant and raised our young in the sea.
Well, it is not all bad.
If Manaka and the others had been left in the sea, and he was alone,
I do not think Hikari would know what to do...
Even now, I look out from here...
To the sea where Hikari and the others are.
Why not warm up a little before the Tomoebi?
You cannot get food like this in the city.
As long as you like it.
Sorry to barge in like this.
It is lively, and I am glad.
Because Tsumugu came to our lab,
our research has progressed quite a bit.
There are only fourteen sea villages in Japan.
Not to mention, we cannot step foot into any of them right now.
Even when we try diving to investigate,
the tide gets in our way and we cannot get close to the location.
There are even specialists now saying that the sea villages do not exist anymore.
They are just saying that to get attention.
I believe that there is a close relationship between the surface and the sea.
we need to research the sea villages as well.
Oh, I will bring you another.
Are you sure there is nothing going on?
You guys are at that age and you are living under one roof.
Not to mention, she is beautiful...
She has someone else that she is liked for a long time.
He can take care of the futon himself.
Will not you come see the Tomoebi, too?
There is no point in seeing the Tomoebi without the others.
Do you want me to make some amazake since it is cold?
What are we going to do?
It really did turn into a huge deal.
Did we find the sea kids that fell in yet?
This is the first time something like this ever happened.
To think that the Sea God was this angry...
What are we going to do about her?
She does not have any relatives on the surface...
You can come live with us.
You have already got a full house in your apartment.
I am from the sea, as well.
Grandpa, the lady next door wanted to give this to you...
If you are a family member, please wait over here.
Do not take anyone else away from me!
Do not worry about it, I will do it myself.
You are not all there when it comes to stuff like this.
So you are going to be a college student in the big city...
Sorry that you somehow ended up taking care of Gramps.
Well, this is my other family.
I am going to do research in college.
I am sure they are tied into what is going to happen on the surface.
I am sure they are fine.
If everything takes a turn for the better,
I am sure we will see them again.
Let us hurry up and eat.
The Tomoebi is about to start.
Today's the day you prove you are a man.
I will go put it away.
Since that day, the sea has been calm.
Not telling me what is happening below.
I am sorry, I was being overly self-conscious.
If I am wrong, do not worry about it.
Then let me say this first.
I am in love with someone else.
Who is this guy you like?
It is quite magnificent, is not it?
Something big is showing up on screen...
He has not changed at all from back then... not at all.
Um, I do not think doing mouth-to-mouth on a person from the sea will...
Like the lull of the sea.
You look like you have seen a monster.
Talk about a turn of events.
Episode Fifteen: The Protector of Smiles
